00029     void SimApplication::run(int argc, char** argv) {
00030 
00031         std::cout << "[ SimApplication ] : starting" << std::endl;
00032 
00033         // If no arguments then start an interactive session.
00034         G4UIExecutive* ui = 0;
00035         if (argc == 1) {
00036             ui = new G4UIExecutive(argc, argv);
00037         }
00038 
00039         // Create run manager.
00040         G4RunManager* runManager = new RunManager;
00041 
00042         // Setup GDML parser and messenger.
00043         G4GDMLParser* parser = new G4GDMLParser();
00044         G4UImessenger* gdmlMessenger = new G4GDMLMessenger(parser);
00045 
00046         // Create application messenger.
00047         new SimApplicationMessenger();
00048 
00049         // Supply default user initializations and actions.
00050         runManager->SetUserInitialization(new DetectorConstruction(parser));
00051         runManager->SetRandomNumberStore(true);
00052 
00053         // Initialize G4 visualization framework.
00054         G4VisManager* visManager = new G4VisExecutive;
00055         visManager->Initialize();
00056 
00057         // Get the pointer to the User Interface manager
00058         G4UImanager* UImanager = G4UImanager::GetUIpointer();
00059 
00060         if (ui == 0) {
00061             // execute macro provided on command line
00062             G4String command = "/control/execute ";
00063             G4String fileName = argv[1];
00064             std::cout << "Executing macro " << fileName << " ..." << std::endl;
00065             UImanager->ApplyCommand(command + fileName);
00066         } else {
00067             // start an interactive session
00068             std::cout << "Starting interactive session ..." << std::endl;
00069             ui->SessionStart();
00070             delete ui;
00071         }
00072 
00073         delete gdmlMessenger;
00074         delete parser;
00075         delete runManager;
00076 
00077         std::cout << "[ SimApplication ] : exiting" << std::endl;
00078     }
00079 
00080 }
